verses.verse: Lord<WH3068>, how are they increased<WH7231> that trouble<WH6862> me<WH7227>! many are they that rise up against me<WH6965>.
Many<WH7227> there be which say<WH559> of my soul<WH5315>, There is no help<WH3444> for him in God<WH430>. Selah<WH5542>.
But you<WH3068>, O Lord, are a shield<WH4043> for me<WH3519>; my glory, and the lifter up<WH7311> of my head<WH7218>.
I cried<WH7121> unto the Lord<WH3068> with my voice<WH6963>, and he heard<WH6030> me out of his holy<WH6944> hill<WH2022>. Selah<WH5542>.
I laid me down<WH7901> and slept<WH3462>; I awaked<WH6974>; for the Lord<WH3068> sustained me<WH5564>.
I will not be afraid<WH3372> of ten thousands<WH7233> of people<WH5971>, that have set<WH7896> themselves against me round about<WH5439>.

Arise<WH6965>, O Lord<WH3068>; save<WH3467> me<WH430>, O my God: for you have struck<WH5221> all my enemies<WH341> upon the cheek bone<WH3895>; you have broken<WH7665> the teeth<WH8127> of the ungodly<WH7563>.
Salvation<WH3444> belongs unto the Lord<WH3068>: your blessing<WH1293> is upon your people<WH5971>. Selah<WH5542>.
